songs.title: I’ll Be In the Sky
songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
I'll be in the sky
I'll be there, ooh all right
I'll be in the sky
I'll be there, ooh all right
I'll be in the sky
(Ooh) Yeah yeah yeah (ooh) yeah yeah yeah
(Ooh) Yeah (ooh) I'll be in the sky
(Ooh) Yeah yeah yeah (ooh) yeah yeah yeah
(Ooh) Yeah (ooh) I'll be in the sky

[Verse 1]
Remember when I leave
That the one in the mirror ain't me
Its just someone that I call B.o.B
Its kinda me but it's not
It's just a mask that I got
So that I can rap and get off my block
Reminiscin' my past when I was a toddler
Sittin' in grass and playin with blocks
To failing my classes now I'm on lock down
Now writin' and readin' a lot
Money and weed is in my shoe box now
While I'm tryna get me a Glock
'Cause I thought I was at the end of my line
Then I find out it was all in my mind
That's why I'm here to end all the fear
We all gon' die and leave from here like

[Pre-Hook]
I was a man with no name
Now I'm attributing mo' fame
But all of this ain't gonna matter when I die
And say goodbye so long, sayonara
I'll have to catch you tomorrow baby
'Cause baby, 'cause baby

[Hook]
I'll be in the sky
I'll be there, ooh all right
I'll be in the sky
I'll be there, ooh all right
I'll be in the sky
(Ooh) Yeah yeah yeah (ooh) yeah yeah yeah
(Ooh) Yeah (ooh) I'll be in the sky
(Ooh) Yeah yeah yeah (ooh) yeah yeah yeah
(Ooh) Yeah (ooh) I'll be in the sky

[Verse 2]
Everyone here gonna die one day
So while I'm here I'mma find my way
That's my forte, that's why I'm here
To open up your ear and speak this real
Beatin' down the block with a tooth
The gold teeth don't really match with the suit
Now-a-days folk would rather rap than go to school
'Cause they feel that if they black then they gotta have a tool
But it don't really seem that bad
After all everybody wanna kick back
They wanna sip 'gnac, they wanna sip Goose
They wanna get down, they wanna get loose
They wanna get blowed, they wanna see the truth
They wanna get old just like you
But since they ain't nobody gon be responsible
I'mma gonna have to be the one to show

[Pre-Hook]
I was a man with no name
Now I'm attributing mo' fame
But all of this ain't gonna matter when I die
And say goodbye so long, sayonara
I'll have to catch you tomorrow baby
'Cause baby, 'cause baby

[Hook]
I'll be in the sky
I'll be there, ooh all right
I'll be in the sky
I'll be there, ooh all right
I'll be in the sky
(Ooh) Yeah yeah yeah (ooh) yeah yeah yeah
(Ooh) Yeah (ooh) I'll be in the sky
(Ooh) Yeah yeah yeah (ooh) yeah yeah yeah
(Ooh) Yeah (ooh) I'll be in the sky

[Outro]
I'll be there, ooh all right
I'll be there
I'll be there, ooh all right
I'll be there
I'll be there, ooh all right
I'll be there
I'll be there, ooh all right
I'll be there
